Class Ball

java.lang.Object
  Ball

public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object

Represents each pool ball

Author:
Taehwan Kim

Constructor Summary
Ball(double x, double y, int num)
          initiates the values and position of a ball
Ball(double x, double y, int num, java.awt.Color c)
          initiates the values and position of a ball AND the color
